title: Undead: Blind Walker
description: A pack of 56 animations to bring your blind undead Walker to life.
longDescription:
This pack of 56 animations depict an undead walker without sight. Unaware and aware locomotion sets are included with turns for each.


PREVIEW VIDEO LINK:


Animation List:

(Note: Arm bites and bite reactions do not match completely perfect and you may have to clean it up for your individual project)


Locomotion:

The following animations are supplied in both root motion and In-Place.

- Undead_Blind_Unaware_WalkBwd_Loop_01

technicalDetails:
Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: Yes

Animation types: Root Motion & In Place

Supported Development Platforms:
